author: W. E. Messamore
title: Politically Correct Vox Edits ‘China’ Out of Coronavirus Explainer Title
description: After weeks of battering Trump for using the term "Wuhan virus," Vox quietly edited its video, "Why New Diseases Keep Appearing In China." The post Politically Correct Vox Edits ‘China’ Out of Coronavirus Explainer Title appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Vox recently edited the word China out of a coronavirus explainer video on YouTube. Is this political correctness gone too far?
  • Or deceptive editing by the center left news and opinion site in the wake of bad faith criticisms of Donald Trump r… [+4573 chars]
